product_name: Von Zipper Speedtuck Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The men's Speedtuck Polarized Sunglasses from VonZipper pair technical performance with next-generation style. Black Satin Speedtuck frames have polarized gray lenses that block 90% of visible light and 100% of harmful UV rays. Polarization cuts glare from water, sand, snow and asphalt so you see colors and contrast more clearly. Polycarbonate lenses are lightweight and virtually shatterproof. Grilamid(R) lightweight nylon frames remain flexible at any temperature and are extremely impact resistant. VonZipper Speedtuck Polarized Sunglasses have protective lens coatings to resist water, smudging, scratching and impact. Rubber nose and temple pads grip securely and stay on even when you're playing hard. Stainless-steel hinges; corrosion-free pop 'n lock cam hinges.
short_description: The men's Speedtuck Polarized Sunglasses from VonZipper pair technical performance with next-generation style.
